about_the_game:
For sweets, What Are Humans?

To sweets, humans are like legendary, towering villains—invincible monsters! They're terrifying devils that eat sweets!

In "Sweets' Devil", our heroine Renée faces off against hostile desserts in epic, explosive battles. But she's not the powerless kid who can't resist! Renée can transform into powerful combat forms, able to suppress the whole battlefield . Make the journey through the fantasy world into a joyous sweets-beating adventure.

After meet and make friends with those magic hats which Renée called them hattie as nickname, more powerful unique outfit transformations 'ATTIRE' will become available, each offering fresh ways to dominate the battlefield.

Beyond battles, Renée can roam the conquered regions, taking on fun challenges and side adventures, diving deeper into the stories with an array of interesting characters.

【Martial Magical Girl————Enemies Who Can't Beat Me Are Made To Be My Friends!】

Transformation! Magic! Battle!

Let the girl who's overflowing the cuteness charges forward with ultimate power and speed!

Combine a vast array of dazzling attacks to obliterate any resistance that stands in your way!

Unleash powerful burst skills to handle the most dangerous situations , turn the tide of battle!

【Intense Combat—One Life but a Second Chance】

While possessing devastating destructive power, the risk lies in the little girl body is so fragile. But, the ATTIRE make up for it with absolute protection!

With balancing gain and lost of hattie, defeat enemies and weaken their defenses, you will in the fast-paced dance of offense and defense.

Smashs, Cuts, Shots, Explosions——ATTIRE absorb every blow, let 'hattie' be knocked in the air to keep you unharmed.

And after summon it back - the sweet legion has wasted their efforts at a great cost to break through your defenses again!!
